title: Kokomo's Cafe Part 1
description: Flagler Beach Florida is quite the small town, eclectic and quirky... and filled with many unique characters. Kokomo's Café owners Mac and Ginny see their fair share day in and day out. As they open Friday morning, they are already lined up at the door. Contemporary Fiction and a fun beach read!Includes the first two short stories in the 10-story Kokomo's Café story arc, "Be Here In The Mornin'" as well as "Girls On The Beach", featuring Michael Zaun and his pal Larry from the horror novella "Tool Shed" (Angelic Knight Press)2 stories plus a sample of "Tool Shed" and Author Notes. 8,900 words in all!
author: Armand Rosamilia
